name: Rescued at Last
description:
Rescued at Last

Play a stranded civilian in the midst of a goddamned zombie breakout. Get to the rescue chopper in a zombie survival top down runner. No guns, just legs and a fighting will to live. Hurry up. Time's running out.

Features
  • 3D graphics
  • Zombie survival
  • Realistic blood
  • Custom SFX
  • Rise of the Valkeries BGM
